website_summaries.verdict: Simple case with a good price point that will enhance the sharp look of your smartphone.
pros: Uses a clear case design to show off the look of your phone
Colors in the edges provide a nice accent and will match the colors featured in different models of the iPhone 8
Frame is impact resistant with a dual-layer design
Uses a thin configuration that won't add bulk to the phone's profile
cons: May suffer discoloration after several months

customer_reviews.title: SAVED MY PHONE
customer_reviews.text: I was playing music on my phone last night and it got accidentally dropped into a raging fire barrel. My quick thinking husband kicked the barrel over and we were able to retrieve my phone. While the case can't be replaced, it did its job and saved my phone. So grateful!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Sillay

customer_reviews.title: Poor Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This was a really nice, good quality case - for the first six months or so. Then a dime sized section of the paint spalled off. The phone belongs to my wife. It was not dropped and the case hasn't been abused in any way. I wrote an email to customer service and did not receive any response whatsoever. I expected a replacement under their 1 year warranty and would have rated this 5 stars if they complied. This is the first time an Amazon seller hasn't even bothered to respond to me. I will not buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ed G

customer_reviews.title: I Dropped My Phone On A Tile Floor...
customer_reviews.text: ...and this case protected it from damage. I don't drop my phone often but let's face it - everyone drops their phone sooner or later. This is a great case that has a slim design and really does protect the phone. I bought one for myself and liked it so much I bought one for my daughter. If you don't care for the big, bulky cases this one might be the answer for you. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Horse

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed with this little case.
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this little case. I purchased the Product Red iPhone 7 and did not want to 'hide' it in my typical Otterbox Defender case. The problem is I have been an Otterbox user since my first iPhone in 2007 and have gotten used to the protection, functions and extra bulkiness of the Defender series. This little case has done the job. After several months it still looks new and has protected my phone from several drops, all of which were on concrete.
customer_reviews.author: SkatejorerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I had thought it was a great case until today
customer_reviews.text: I needed to change my 5 star to a 1 star review! I haven't had this for a year and the bottom just cracked! I didn't even drop it. Very frustrating. I had thought it was a great case until today. Not sure if I'll get a refund, but I'm definitely not purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: Author Robin Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great protection without the bulk!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this case. I've been using Caseology's Skyfall line since I had my iPhone 6 and got this for my 7. The pink sides are a great match for my rose-gold iPhone. The case is flexible and light, but it really protects the phone well. I haven't dropped my 7 yet, but I dropped my 6 quite a bit -- and on hard surfaces -- and never had a scratch. You don't need to put your smartphone in a vault to protect it!
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Young

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case since September 2016 (and I am writing this review April 2018). The case still holds up and despite how many times I've dropped my phone, the case has kept it protected from breaking. The only sign of wear is the paint coming off on the edges (largely because I've dropped the phone many times). I highly recommend this product, and I've since bought two more for friends who also love it just as much.
customer_reviews.author: Kate B

customer_reviews.title: love the way it looks
customer_reviews.text: Really love the way this case looks and feels. I have been obsessed with rose gold lately and I wanted a case that would show the color of my phone. I've always been a fan of caseology and have bought many cases from them in past. I feel like the phone is well protected and it looks great. My only trouble with it is that it seems to get dirty pretty fast. Since it is clear you can see all the dirt particles that build up inside and it bugs me a little bit. But other than that the case protects the food from scratches and is great.
customer_reviews.author: Maisa Morrar

customer_reviews.title: Terrible protection
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, terrible protection. Extremely disappointing, as it broke the very next day after I put it on my phone. The clear portion of the case seems sturdy, however it's the black bumper portion that broke almost instantly. I want my money back or a better re placement, hoping mine was simply a defect because it is a nice sleek design that APPEARS to be protective. Didn't even drop my phone and the case broke when I tried to remove my phone from it.
customer_reviews.author: Kar

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Plastic Product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this case.. I just received it on Thursday, put it on my phone Friday, and it's broken already by Tuesday. The bottom part of the case (where the charger would go and where the speakers are) was never flush with the actual plastic part of the case. Today it completely broke off. The whole sides of the case are now coming off as well as it was all one piece of plastic. The case looks great and matches my rose gold phone perfectly but I need a functional case.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Eccleston

customer_reviews.title: Loved my case at first
customer_reviews.text: Loved my case at first. It Looked pretty and matched my rose gold phone. HOWEVER, was on the boardwalk 3 days after it was received and the pretty rose gold color turned a shade of PURPLE. Maybe the sunlight exposure causes a change in color? Whatever the case, was highly disappointed about this. Informed seller via email and they didn't offer a exchange or refund, just asked for a photo to "document claim and improve quality control issues."
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Minimalist and Incredibly Durable
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Skyfall case on my original iPhone SE for the past four years. Despite countless drops (including many onto concrete and one into a pool) this case protected my phone to the point where it isn't even scratched after all of this time. I just upgraded to the new SE and so naturally went immediately for the Skyfall again. The phone is red and I love the minimalist design with the clear back and the option for the matching red sides. Case looks great, isn't bulky, easy to snap on and off and really is AMAZINGLY durable, especially given how sleek it is.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Caseology phone case. I had the Rose Gold for my former 1st generation iPhone SE. I loved it. I recently upgraded to the iPhone SE 2020, in (Product) Red. Of course I got a new Caseology case for it. Sturdy, the red color is perfect, as well as the fit, easy to grip in my small hand and I trust this brand in case I do accidentally drop it. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: RomanceGirl

customer_reviews.title: Best case I've ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this case. I drop my phone a lot. And I mean a LOT. This case protects it very well. I first purchased this case two years ago and just today had to order a replacement. I finally dropped it one too many times, lol, and the outer plastic case broke. But the case still did its job and protected my phone. It doesn't have a scratch on it. The clear rubber inner case also doesn't get yellow and brown over time the way so many of them do. I also love that the red matches my red iPhone. It's an absolutely perfect color match. VERY happy with this case and will buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Long

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I have had this case for about 4 months now and I love it. I love the thinness of the case yet it is very protective. I previously had an otterbox for many years and loved the protection it gave however it was kind of bulky and I wanted a change. I have dropped my phone more times than I care to admit and this case has been awesome and very protective. The case matches the red iPhone 7 perfectly. Love it. Will get another.
customer_reviews.author: Angela J. Martens

customer_reviews.title: Toddler proof!
customer_reviews.text: This case is great. After having it for 3 years, it only now just fell apart. It has kept my phone safe, and my phone still looks brand new-even after sending my toddler after it. My kid has dropped my phone several times on cement ground, shopping store floors, etc, and not once did my phone shatter or crack. Neither did the case! a very durable case and for at the price point, far exceeded my expectations! I am actually coming back to purchase another case to replace the other. I highly recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: PHONE CAN STILL CRACK UNDERNEATH THE CASE !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this case for a little over 2 years now -- I know it seems like a long time, but many people don't replace phones very often and therefore don't need to replace phone cases either. Admittedly I dropped my phone today (not from an extraordinary high though).... and to my surprise... my phone cracked UNDERNEATH THE PHONE CASE!! I'm in shock. This is completely NOT as advertised! Also, as you can see, the coloring is all faded around the edges after use. It's been like this for a while but I didn't mind it too much. I definitely DO MIND my phone cracking underneath! this is unbelievable!! Would absolutely never order again.
customer_reviews.author: Huey Ru Wang

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping the camera opening would be properly cut out (I've purchased other cases supposedly for iPhone 8s, and half the camera eye was hidden by the case). This case fits perfect. I love its looks, it is slimmer than my old ones, and so far appears to be sturdy and protective (I've accidentally bounced it on some tile floors already, and it has survived without a scratch. I would definitely recommend this case, and will gladly purchase from this buyer again.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Grace

customer_reviews.title: Protect your iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for the very same product, which I had originally ordered over a year and a half ago. Since that time I have dropped my iPhone more times than I can count and, thanks to this product, my iPhone was never damaged in the least. The case, however, finally sustained minor damage. I figured rather than having to replace my iPhone, I would spend a few bucks to buy a new case. The case is very attractive and sturdy. It is a little thicker than some cases I have seen but not too thick. It was quite easy to remove and replace, after fighting for several minutes to remove the protective tape.
customer_reviews.author: steveszat

customer_reviews.title: Practically Perfect in every Way
customer_reviews.text: This case fits the new iPhone 7 very well, and keeps it safe. It isn't slippery, it looks awesome on the rose gold phone. My only complaint is that it is so pretty, too many people in our family have identical cases, and we get our phones mixed up. But seriously, this case is the best deal for the best quality out there if you want a case to match your new rose gold phone. I didn't get this for free, I am a real consumer who paid full price for this case.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi in Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, but doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had 3 of these, and each one has lasted about 5 months. First, the pros: PERFECT red color to match my Product (Red) iPhone. It doesn’t interfere with my cell signal, unlike other metal bumper covers. Cons: It breaks easily where the case is only a thin bar next to the volume buttons on the left side. One broke while I was removing the cover to clean out the dust. :/ Which leads me to the next point: it’s dusty inside between the clear back & your phone. If this lasted longer, I’d get it again, but this was the third strike. :(
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Knight

customer_reviews.title: Caseoloty skyfall iphone 8 cover red
customer_reviews.text: fits really nice on the iPhone 8 red. my only issue is that when you peel the shipping protector cover off, cause a lot of static, and dust and what not is attracted to the cover instantly. also the rear of the silicone cover shows finger prints like there is no tomorrow. but once cleaned it is one nice looking phone case. extra bonus, if you turn on the flash notification and place the phone back side down, the light show thru the silicone case. make up for the finger print issues. all in all I love the look of this case. s
customer_reviews.author: Donny from RI

customer_reviews.title: A great case, letting the phone’s color show
customer_reviews.text: I immediately liked this case. Clear on the back and a perfectly matched red on the sides. It offers great protection - I’ve dropped this phone way too many times, nothing bad has happened to it. After several months of (ab)use. :-) the red plastic edging broke in two places. I didn’t hesitate to buy another. I have paired this with a glass screen protector, so my Red iPhone has survived all kinds of clumsiness and other mishaps.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Feblowitz

customer_reviews.title: I had a previous caseology case that was felt good but got a little scratched up due to dropping ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous caseology case that was felt good but got a little scratched up due to dropping a few times. This case however seems like a nice idea but you see every speck of dust trapped between the case and the clear back. Also, it’s finish is easily scratched and the worst thing about it is that the case literally fees greasy, even immediately after cleaning with with a variety of different products. I wouldn’t by it again or recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Byrne

customer_reviews.title: It's a fine case.
customer_reviews.text: Like others have said, this case does show wear. I've dropped my phone 3 times in this case (over about 5 months). Once, on a walking track at a park. The case was a little dinged up, but the phone was fine. I've also dropped it on tile floor in my kitchen--once again, phone fine. I dropped it on concrete at a sporting event--screen shattered. So, it protects the phone well on the edges when it's dropped, but do get a tempered glass screen cover.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren H.

customer_reviews.title: Id buy it if I hadn't already!
customer_reviews.text: This isa great case. It doesn't cover the phone so much that you can't see it. It fits well and is not too hard to remove as some are. It does not add much bulk to the phone either.I really like it and I think it was a good purchase. I actually like it better than the $40 cover my daughter has on hers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skyfall series good slim fit case with color accent options
customer_reviews.text: First, I like the Skyfall series design. Packaging is legit, too. Second, when I ordered the iPhone8 and iPhone8plus cases, I received two iPhone8 cases and no iPhone8plus case. Kept the second iPhone8 case and gave it to my spouse as her backup. Went back online and ordered two more iPhone8plus cases for myself. Good to go. Wether or not it was a mistake, the cases are worthy, affordable, with options in multiple styles. Easy and seemingly safe to put in and take out phone without stressing case or the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: This offers a nice clean surface and protective so she won't do any ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter asked me to order this for her. She has a history of dropping her phone and cracking the screen. We had just gotten the screen replaced the week prior. However, 48 hours after ordering it, she dropped her phone and cracked her screen again. This offers a nice clean surface and protective so she won't do any further damage. (I hope) Nice to have the option of the Rose gold. She hated using a case as it would cover the rose gold color of the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: This case frames my iPhone nice. It feels sturdy and matches the color nicely. I bought this to replace my other 2 year old caseology case that I felt was getting worn. This does create that little bubble or kind of wet look on the back of the phone but it doesn’t really bother me for how much I like the case and the cost. I got this for the regular iPhone 8
customer_reviews.author: MER

customer_reviews.title: Provides Excellent Protection!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. It has protected my phone from sooooo many falls - between my toddlers and my general clumbsiness. Seriously, my phone has been dropped multiple times face down on hard surfaces inside and out, and my phone has been protected every time. I did have to buy a second case because of how hard I am on my phone because with enough falls the paint wears away a tad on the corners, but it was well worth purchasing again. Besides the protection, I like the slim profile, the rose gold matches perfectly, it allows my phone back to show through, and it doesn’t obstruct the cameras in any way.
customer_reviews.author: C. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My iphone in this case somehow managed to get itself wedged between the springs in my "lazyboy" type chair. I looked and looked for two weeks for my missing phone. Finally I found it wedged between the springs on the chair in which I plopped often when I pulled the lever to extend the place for my feet tension was placed on my phone! Finally when I found it and managed to dislodge it the screen cover was badly scratched, this case was very scratched, but the phone anfer re-charging was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: long time cook

customer_reviews.title: Slim enough for pocket
customer_reviews.text: I mostly just wanted a case that offered some barrier between my phone and hard surfaces, but was slim enough to still fit in my back pocket. This Skyfall Series is exactly that. It's not going to protect your phone from major drops, but it does alright with little dinks and dings. The rose color matches my rose iPhone 7 exactly and it looks chic and clean. It was also easy to put on, but not so much take off.
customer_reviews.author: OceanHips

customer_reviews.title: Hard corners crack easy, would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this brand in the past and loved it, but I don't like this style at all. My other one actually had the softer rubber at the corners which is great for taking impact. These have the hard plastic. The first time the phone took a spill the corner of the case cracked. It did protect the phone but the case looks bad already. It just makes more since to have impart resistant edges like my iPhone 7 design did from Caseology. I would not recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: LilSoph

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised- very nice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a number of cases to try. This one was the one I decided to keep. Slim, attractive and although I haven’t had a drop to test it with, seems to protect my phone well. One thing I had completely missed in the description was the fact that the back is clear. My bad. I would have preferred a solid back as now you can see the black magnet thingy I have within the case that I use with my magnetic car phone holder- but, oh well. Like I said - MY bad on that one.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth vI

customer_reviews.title: It’s great...until it cracks.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the phone case. It looked great with my red phone. It cracked after 9 months. Not due to a drop. I was typing and it cracked across the top. Maybe three stars is harsh considering the pricing of the case. My phone still looks brand new with the case off. I’m just annoyed that it didn’t even last a year.
customer_reviews.author: A. Longoria

customer_reviews.title: Very nice case
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking case and it matches perfectly with my new rose gold iPhone 7. I don't tend to drop my phone so I got this more "in case" than truly testing its durability. My only very minor gripe is that it was difficult to peel those transparent "protectors" off of both sides of the clear back. Maybe they could have a tab so you could get a get a grip to start to peel them?
customer_reviews.author: Cathy D.

customer_reviews.title: Good case, recommend
customer_reviews.text: Ok the case lasted 1,5 years and now its paint peeled off on the sides and the clear back is all in scratches. But I think it’s not too bad, I dropped my phone several times on hard surfaces without any damage to it, I think this case definitely helped, it gives a phone good protection (in addition to screen protector). I’ll buy another one like this.
customer_reviews.author: OlgaB

customer_reviews.title: Never disappoint...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand for a long time for myself as well as for my family's phone and I can say that it never disappoints me at all. It is sturdy, right fit and also protect my phone. It is also very stylish and never slippery. when your holding your phone. If I change a case for my phone, my go to brand is Caseology.
customer_reviews.author: Luvtoshop

customer_reviews.title: Broke way too quickly!
customer_reviews.text: The case fits well and looks good, but broke after 3 months! The plastic outer ring broke at the narrow part near the bottom. It was just sitting in my pocket, and when I pulled it out it broke - no dropping, no trauma, just regular use. I've experienced much better durability with previous Caseology cases - hopefully this is just a fluke!
customer_reviews.author: Nick K

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got a 14 year old whose phone seems to be permanently in hand. We had an OtterBox previously but wanted something a little more slim for his new phone. I poured over reviews and settled on this case. It looks great with his project red phone and more importantly, has kept it safe from scratches and falls. We did use a glass screen protector for the front for extra protection and are very happy with this product! I’m going to order one in gold for myself.
customer_reviews.author: J.Julia

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: This case is okay but definitely not my favorite. It does not seem to keep debris from getting inside the case and I have had to remove it several times to clean crevices where junk gets stuck. I keep my phone sitting on a table or in a pocket of my purse with nothing else yet paint is already starting to chip off of the case. Overall, for the money it is a decent case but definitely not something I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather CTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Design. Not So Perfect Case.
customer_reviews.text: I really, really, really love the design of this case. In fact, it's my absolute favorite. I have, however, been pretty disappointed by the hard shell breaking and the companies practice/policy on returns. I've had two of these cases in less than nine months and the company won't send you a replacement unless you send in the broken case. I've had instances before were a case needed to be returned, but they'd have me send a pictures and get the case to me right away.
customer_reviews.author: Eve H.

customer_reviews.title: Great case.  Perfect color.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Caseology line of iPhone cases. I recently updated my phone to the new iPhone (product) red color. I bough a clear case with the phone at AT&T but it was just too slippery and hard to hold. Then I saw this Skyfall series case in red. Perfect enhancement to the beautiful red color of my phone without hiding it. The side edge of the cover has enough texture to it so it does not slip it out your hands. All in all a very god case for the phone.
customer_reviews.author: SMT

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. Feels like I got a new phone. Sleek, stylish and easy to hold. Was worried it’d be slippery without the rubber backing I usually opt for. It’s not. And it’s nice I can protect my phone and showcase the color and design of it too. Pleased and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SFworkingpro

customer_reviews.title: Phone is ok after being run over with a car!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this case for a year and a half. Drop my phone multiple times a day, between this and a screen protector my phone has not been damaged. Today I actually RAN my phone over with my car. Not on purpose. My screen protector was cracked all over and this case now has a crack in the bottom but no damage to my phone! I’m in shock that my phone is completely fine! I’m buying this case again, I’m so impressed and grateful I don’t have to buy a new phone!!
customer_reviews.author: Dena McGree

customer_reviews.title: Feels and looks sleek, but tough.
customer_reviews.text: I love how this feels: it’s not one of those cases that turns my little iPhone 7 into a brick, but the sturdy rubbery bumper and the hard back feel like a new hardier version of my phone. I’ve only had it for a few days, so I can’t speak on how well it protects the phone in drops. I have never shattered my phone with any case, but drop it regularly enough that if this doesn’t work, you guys will for sure find out.
customer_reviews.author: Ivanna Y

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get the protective film off
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking case and really lets the beauty of the iPhone show through. I also had extreme difficulty removing the protective film and unfortunately did not search the product page for a solution until after I had scored the film (and also the case) in order to get it off. So now I am left with a great case with a nice big scratch, but I will use it and know better next time.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: I love this case so much that I purchased this again ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this case so much that I purchased this again for my new iphone 7. The first was for iPhone 6S plus and the case protected my phone so many times. I dropped my iPhone 6S plus multiple times on a hard cement floors and because of the case my phone doesn't have any scratches. It's really easy to put the case on as well as take it off. I would definitely recommend to anyone. No, I DID NOT receive a discount on this item.
customer_reviews.author: wanderlust

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this, as it allows the rose gold hue ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this, as it allows the rose gold hue of my iphone to come through. However, it is not very tight of a fit and I get all kinds of dog hair, dust, and other grit stuck between this case and my phone. I've had it for several months and have to clean it out every couple weeks. If you have a cleaner lifestyle (and maybe don't have two high-shedding dogs), you might like it. Quality is good and the match to the phone color is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Anne

customer_reviews.title: Not gold
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the gold is not gold. It's more of a peach color. It's a little too like my prior rose gold phone and case. I was looking for a change and thought the gold would compliment my new black phone well. It still looks nice, but it's not the gold I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This case is so pretty and sturdy! I have a rose gold iphone 7 and I wanted something to match it. This case is the perfect color and it completely protects my phone, its secures the edges which is very important. There is nothing more fustrating than cracked or scratched edges. It has a rubbery/hard feel which I like. I'm not a huge fan of rubber or hard cases, but this is the perfect in between.
customer_reviews.author: FeeFee

customer_reviews.title: I DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a clear sleek phone case so off course I went onto Amazon. I regret spending $10+ on this case because within the first couple of months the case paint started chipping. I’m very careful with my phone so it was so shocking on how fast the case was chipping. The case is not scratch resistant and it’s not the best quality. I recommend just buying a plain $7 clear case that will last way longer than this case. Save your money and find a different case.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good, but it’s only been a month. It is a little slippery so I’m very careful what pocket I put it in. Thought it was responsible for my iPhone getting very warm (8), but I took it off and the 8 gets hot all by itself.
customer_reviews.author: VegasRunaway

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, survived drop, very snug/hard to take off
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, so I'm basing this off of what she has to say about it Pros: - Pretty - Survived at least one drop - Very secure/snug Cons: - Scratches easily - Not the easiest to hold, a bit slippery (we bought a pop socket to stick to the back, which helped) - Hard to get off. If she ever wants to take the case off, she asks me to do it so she doesn't break something
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Cohen

customer_reviews.title: didn’t even have a chance
customer_reviews.text: So the case arrives and it looks decent, and it says to remove protective film from the front and back of case by peeling up from the corners. Sounds simple enough. NOPE! Not a single corner lifts, I was picking and picking at every possible option, when the bottom of the outer case broke off. Easily I might add, so it’s not too durable anyway. But unfortunately, I still cannot remove the ‘protective’ film. Refund please!
customer_reviews.author: kellie lynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my iPhone 7!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful case...matches the gold on my iPhone 7 perfectly. Also, this case appears to be made for the iPhone 7 specifically...not the 6 or 6s. All holes for the speakers, plug, and camera line up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kas

customer_reviews.title: Caseology matched Apple quality, look, and feel!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case because it had a good rating. And I rarely leave customer feedback. But here I feel like I really want this amazing product to receive recognition. When i received the product I was impressed beyond my expectation in terms of quality, ook and feel of the product. And I love how it exactly matches the color of IPhone too. I would say this product feels like it was produced by Apple - high quality, outstanding look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have one :)
customer_reviews.text: First of all NO ONE PAYED ME TO WROTE THIS REVIEW. So sad we must claim that on amazon now a days... I just put on my case for the golden rose case/iPhone and it fits/looks/feels great! Such a great buy. It's definitely good quality, if you end up getting it you'll see for yourself when you feel it on your iPhone 7. thank you for the great product packaging Caseology!! I like their packing design as well ;)
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Will save your phone.
customer_reviews.text: So this just happened. I have had this case over a year and loved it. But tonight while watching fireworks on my roof with my daughter (4th of July) my phone fell from my hand and did a 10 foot drop to concrete below. The case busted. But my phone is still perfect. The case did it's job beautifully and I will be getting a second one. Very much worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Haylibean

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: Had a 16yo student staying with us for 4 months and he bought this phone with his own money. He didn't want to use a case but I insisted he was not going to break his phone on my watch. No problems with moisture between the phone and case. My daughter uses the Skyfall on her SE and it held up well, so that's what we got for him to use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, looks good and will protect my phone well
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of this case. Adds a bit of bulk whichh is necessary to protect the phone, but doesn’t look as bulky as it is because of the mix of clear and rubbery materials. A little bit of grip around the edges to help hold it. Holes for charger and mic are nice and big so they don’t interfere with inserting the charging cable. A bit challenging to put on but you get a nice snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: mcrose

customer_reviews.title: Great case but the back gets gross!!
customer_reviews.text: This case is pretty great and does a good job at protecting your phone but there's a couple of issues. First it gets nasty in the back pretty quickly after having it on and it's just not cute. I'm not sure if going with another brand of clear case would fix this but I always have to take it off too clean and it's not the easiest to get off. Second I've had this for about 9 month and I'd say around month 3 it started to yellow pretty bad and overall is just pretty nasty now. It's a good case and if you like this style maybe a good one for you just be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: and extremely light not good protection if the phone falls it will crack for ...
customer_reviews.text: Hopeless !! No screen guard no cover for screen .. costly just to cover the back in pink color.. and extremely light not good protection if the phone falls it will crack for sure
customer_reviews.author: Zonar

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy case!
customer_reviews.text: For the most part I'm very happy with this case. I love the look, its a perfect match for my rose gold phone. Its very sturdy, I've already dropped my phone a few times with no damage to the case or phone. It's not the easiest to get on and off, but the best cases usually aren't. My only complaint is that its getting a yellowish discoloration on the sides where my fingers are usually around the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I read all the negative reviews before purchasing this item, and I ignored them but I regret it. This is basically the worst phone case I’ve ever bought from any website. Extremely hard material, so hard to put on and off, after using only one day, the back side of it cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Nazeli

customer_reviews.title: Quality iPhone Case!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for my new iPhone 8 a few months ago and so far I have been pretty pleased with it. It seems to protect my phone okay, although I would feel better if it was just a bit more substantial, especially around the camera lens on the back of the iPhone, but I also did not want to have a big, bulky case either. Like I said before, so far it has been a good case and I would recommend this to anyone looking for an iPhone 7 or 8 case!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H.

customer_reviews.title: 3 weeks and already broken
customer_reviews.text: Normally Caseology phone cases are amazingly sturdy and durable. However not with this one. Its been 3 weeks since I got it and the hard plastic is already broken around the silencing switch. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this case looking for a case that offered protection without covering up my red iPhone 8. It’s too soon to determine durability but I based my 3 stars on the many positive claims made by others, it might be a 5 in time. With that said it really shows off the great looks of the red iPhone 8. the frame color is damn near a spot on match. And the clear inner shell lets you see the phone clearly. It would be nice to incorporate some type of grippy band on the back so it doesn’t slide around but with that aside it’s a real nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Case will be collecting dust in a drawer.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I read the reviews before purchasing. I get the "puddles" thing. The clear sticks to the phone and makes a weird puddle looking thing where it touches. Looks like crap and then after only 2 days the dust starts to gather inside especially around the ringer switch. It would probably protect ok.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CASE! LOOKS GOOD! DURABLE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case to match my gold iphone 7s. I wanted something that didn't hide the gold casing but protected my phone at the same time and also didn't look cheap. I am very happy with this case. I have dropped my phone at least 3 times since buying this a month ago and I am happy to say my phone is scratch and crack free! I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: Protects my case well enough from frequent drops but pink paint is wearing off after only a few months of use. Also hair, fuzz and dirt get trapped under the case and you can see it all through the clear back. I'd rather not have a case that I have to take off regularly to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Stillman

customer_reviews.title: Nice Phone Case
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of this phone case. I only ordered a second because I broke my first one (like I actually broke my first one by pulling the bottom part off and snapping it off). I really like how smooth and nice it is. I like the double layer feature. Very happy with my order
customer_reviews.author: Divine Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: This case is aesthetically pleasing and displays the physical attributes of the iPhone. It is slippery at first cut your hands Cecile accustomed to grasping the rubbery side grip. I’ve already dropped my phone a few times in this case and it has more than done its’ job. I have waited for a perfect clear case that is also reliable and I feel as though I’ve found it!
customer_reviews.author: Jo and Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly durable!
customer_reviews.text: I ride a motorcycle and I bought this product 4 years ago. About a year later I dropped it while riding and it was all scratched up. I was amazed it still worked. Screen saver also destroyed and phone still looked new. Bought my second Skyfall about 8 months ago. I'll never be without it!
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Was great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: This was a great phone case until it fell apart on me. The clear plastic that surrounds the phone is fine but the colored part that snaps on around it just broke off into three different pieces in less then two months. Also dust and dirt find its way under the clear section making it look pretty dirty. I loved the look of this case but I need something that will last longer then two months.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Hard to remove
customer_reviews.text: This case is OK. It’s pretty and I can see the pretty rose gold through the clear plastic without any issues. My gripe with it is that it’s hard to take off and I ended up braking nails every time I take it off, unless I take my sweet time with it (I’m talking around a full minute to get this thing off and this is not usually an issue for me with cases). I do feel like it protects my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Alé

customer_reviews.title: ... this case for about 3 weeks and it works great. Haven’t drop my phone so I’m not sure ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this case for about 3 weeks and it works great. Haven’t drop my phone so I’m not sure how much protection it gives and hopefully I don’t have to find out ;) I had casology case for my old iPhone and it protected my phone from scratches and cracking so I have high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: Karolina

customer_reviews.title: It was time to repurchase and would buy again
customer_reviews.text: After a year I had to replace it. Too many scratches after so many drops on the cement. I always drop it when I’m getting off of my car or taking my kids off. Great buy for the price and has protected my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Verito

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I drop my phone all of the time on concrete and tiled floors and this inexpensive case is a life saver. I go through about 2 cases a year as I replace the case when it’s cracked. Excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: Saber Roulette

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it, very durable & attractive!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for wife's iPhone 8, she loves it!...previously had bi-fold leatherette case which although handy, wore out too quickly. This one's durable, attractive and now allows her to mount phone in cradle when driving. Buy it, you won't regret it PS. You'll still need a lay over/on top screen protector!
customer_reviews.author: ftby59

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice case.
customer_reviews.text: This case does what it should. It protects my cell phone. The color nearly matches my cell phone color. I have the red iPhone. The rubbery bumper saved my phone from several drops. I do recommend this case. Awesome sellers. I received my case before I expected it to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Jamis

customer_reviews.title: Cute, slim and practical.
customer_reviews.text: Love this case! It's cute and the extra lip keeps my screen from touching direct surfaces. You can actually see the back of your colored phone and it's still small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snug and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Item came as described, the color of the red matches the new iPhone 2020. Clean, minimal and makes the phone feel almost naked. Doesn't feel slick and case covers all corners appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: Thaeyo

customer_reviews.title: Love this case
customer_reviews.text: Love this case! - It's super slim, low profile and feels well made. It fits my iphone 8 perfectly and has protected it against already at least a handful of drops (falling out of purses or knocked off desks). The gold color does not match the new gold of the iphone 8 but I think it adds a slight contrast. Previously I only bought speck iphone cases but decided to switch due to lack of case options/high price - so far very happy with this case after two months!
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: Does not protect
customer_reviews.text: I have boughten multiple caseology cases for my samsung phones. They have been very sturdy, cute and protective. Wear and tear happened overtime but that was expected. I had this case for about two weeks and it has no protected my phone. I have dropped my phone maybe twice with it on.there are multiple scratches on the case. Including the corners and the back side ! I noticed a scratch on the clear back and a "shadow" of that on my phone. I took the case off and to my surprise my BRAND NEW IPHONE 7 has two DENTS in it because this case was my protective enough.
customer_reviews.author: kaelyn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice phone case
customer_reviews.text: I got this case just for protection for my phone and I am really glad I did. I like it more than I thought and it looks great on my phone! I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Rae Davis

customer_reviews.title: Rose Gold IPhone 7 Case
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful case. It matches my rose gold iPhone 7 perfectly. I bought it 5 months ago and am a pro at dropping my phone. This case has held up nicely! No dings or major scratches and it has done a great job of keeping my phone protected. I had an otter box on my old phone and didn't want to spend $50+ on another one. I was also looking for a case that doesn't make my phone bulky and this one is perfect. This case does its job for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Little annoying
customer_reviews.text: I like the look but the clear cover sticks to the back of the phone in the center. This makes it look like there is moisture under the cover but there isn’t. It’s air. Constantly pulling the case off slightly to unstick it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Curtiss

customer_reviews.title: Broke within the first 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I received this case today and was excited to put it on my new iPhone 8. Once on it looked great! But, I realized that I need to remove the plastic film from the inside back of the case - and so I needed to take the case off again to get to the film to remove it. As I was taking off the case, it snapped in my hand and broke. So, the case lasted all of 5 minutes before breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Trueblood

customer_reviews.title: Great color and Keeps the phone in great comdition
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I fell in love with the rose gold color of my phone! Still can perfectly see it! I also drop t almost daily between my toddler and myself and on the concrete multiple times and have yet to break it or even crack the screen! This will be the cases I always get in the future!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The soft rubbery plastic case has a great feel and I love the rose colored edges to ...
customer_reviews.text: The soft rubbery plastic case has a great feel and I love the rose colored edges to match my new phone, but the case isn’t really tight. Although it’s obviously not going to come off without effort, it’s a little loose around the sides so I’m sure dust and dirt will be able to enter. It’s very comfortable but I certainly would not want to drop it; I don’t think it provides too much protection.
customer_reviews.author: traveler

customer_reviews.title: Case is for iPhone 7 > iPhone 8
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time I've bought this. First time the case lasted 3 years, just become discolored. 2nd case cracked on me both near the charging port and sound buttons within 1 month. Basically, this is excellent for an iPhone 7, slightly less for iPhone 8.
customer_reviews.author: Arutha

customer_reviews.title: Gets dirty easily
customer_reviews.text: My pink case turned into a mauve color and got so dirty so fast. Happened with my new case from caseology too.
customer_reviews.author: Vyun

customer_reviews.title: Going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone case September 24, 2017 and it's now Feb. 19, 2018. The case still looks new! It's saved my phone from falls and was easy to put on. Nothing more to say except that lint does get trapped in the clear part so that can get a little annoying. I don't really look at the back of my phone much so that's ok to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P.

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a great quality, sleek phone case for cheap, I'd 10/10 recommend. It looks and feels great. Just be careful when taking it off, it seems that the plastic/rubber outer bumper could snap easily if not carefully removed.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar DeNoyer

customer_reviews.title: Case Saved Phone
customer_reviews.text: Amazing case! Embarrassing but true story, Dorian a recent visit to NOLA, I had my phone in my hand and tripped on the sidewalk. During my fall, the case itself encountered some major damage. The good news is, my phone was completely unharmed! Isn't this what good cases are for?!
customer_reviews.author: Raeven

customer_reviews.title: Nice, small form case
customer_reviews.text: Like this case - fits my i7 perfectly and looks great. Replacing the same case I had previously that lasted about 1 year before it cracked. Happy I could get the same type again. Best thing about this case is it keeps me from accidental hitting the SILENT switch on the side of the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Hazelwood

customer_reviews.title: This case is awesome!! was looking for a simple clear rose ...
customer_reviews.text: This case is awesome!! was looking for a simple clear rose gold case for my iphone 7 and here ya go! fits perfectly, is a great mix of hard plastic and a little flexy plastic. Would 100% recommend and will be buying this case again in the future, although it is super durable so idk when that will be
customer_reviews.author: Erin Darabant

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Protects my phone. Fits perfectly! Only problem I’ve had is it can be a bit slippery. But I’ve dropped my phone a few times and it is fine. Definitely recommend purchase for protection
customer_reviews.author: Auntie

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This case is so pretty. It really helps accentuate my rose gold phone. It has only a slight lip on the front so I don't know how well it would protect if my phone fell on its face. I had an otter box before and it had a much larger lip that made me feel more safe. But with a screen protector I imagine it would be perfect and much less bulky than the otter box. I'm going to buy one for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie M.

product_meta.title: Caseology Skyfall for Apple iPhone SE 2020 Case for iPhone 8 Case (2017) for iPhone 7 Case (2016) - Rose Gold
product_meta.description: Color:Rose GoldThe minimalist’s dream come true. We wanted to make a case that is as precisely engineered. Drop-tested, certified military grade materials meet an ultra-modern design in Skyfall. Our reinforced bumper ensures grip and protection, in a variety of hues, while the crystal-clear back allows your device’s sleek design to speak for itself. Skyfall’s slim profile is compatible with most wireless chargers. Our stylish and functional design complements, but never compromises on safety.
feature_bullets: Slim protective bumper with reinforced corner cushion protection and Ultra-clear PC, carefully packaged with removable protective film on both sides
Extra raised lips provide military grade materials and certified by multiple drop tests for drop-proof
Slim ultra clear back meets colors made to complement your device, with tactile buttons and precise cutouts for perfect fit
Built to be wireless charging compatible and screen protector compatible
Caseology Skyfall Designed for Apple iPhone SE Case 2020 for iPhone 8 Case (2017) for iPhone 7 Case

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars5,770 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
